typography.instructions: Use Manrope for all headings to give a modern, geometric industrial feel. Use IBM Plex Sans for all body text, tables, and forms for maximum legibility. Use JetBrains Mono for part numbers, SKUs, and technical data.

accent.description: Safety Orange - Use for primary actions and critical alerts

colors.rules: Strict Light Mode. No dark mode toggle. Use high contrast for data readability. Avoid large gradients. Use solid colors for clarity.

layout.density: High. Use 'h-9' for inputs and buttons. Reduce padding in tables to maximize data visibility.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-9 px-4 rounded-sm font-medium transition-colors
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-9 px-4 rounded-sm font-medium transition-colors
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-9 px-4 rounded-sm transition-colors
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-9 px-4 rounded-sm transition-colors
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 h-9 px-4 rounded-sm transition-colors

cards.style: rounded-sm border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm
cards.header: p-6 flex flex-row items-center justify-between space-y-0 pb-2

inputs.style: flex h-9 w-full rounded-sm border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.header: h-10 px-4 text-left align-middle font-medium text-muted-foreground bg-secondary/50

badges.default: inline-flex items-center rounded-sm border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2 border-transparent bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/80

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1 against background.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.

dashboard_hero.usage: Dashboard welcome banner or empty state background

engineer_planning.usage: Project planning or engineering section header

factory_floor.usage: Supplier management or production tracking background

steps: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install lucide-react recharts date-fns react-day-picker`
2. Configure Tailwind: Update `tailwind.config.js` with the color palette and font families.
3. Global CSS: Update `index.css` to enforce the light theme variables and font imports.
4. Layout Structure: Create a `Layout` component with a sidebar navigation and top header.
5. Dashboard: Implement the 'Control Room' grid layout using the specified grid system.
6. Components: Customize Shadcn components (Button, Card, Table, Input) to match the 'Precision Industrial' style (rounded-sm, dense padding).
7. Charts: Use Recharts for Gantt charts and cost analysis, styled with the theme colors.
universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise.
Do NOT use 'Inter' font. Use 'Manrope' for headings and 'IBM Plex Sans' for body.
Ensure all interactive elements have `data-testid` attributes.
Prioritize data density. Avoid excessive whitespace in tables.
Use 'Safety Orange' (#f97316) sparingly for primary actions and alerts only.
